modName: ToL Werewolf Overhaul The call of the Bloodmoon
summary: Features compatibility with ALL werewolf mods,standalone+tol compatible,werewolf perk tree etc...
descriptionHtml:
[center][s][size=5][color=red][b]-Tales Of Lycanthropy THE CALL OF THE BLOODMOON-[/b][/color][/size][/s][/center]

[center][size=5][color=red][b]Please read the description before downloading and installing,the mod features one esp now which is both Tales Of Lycanthropy compatible and standalone at the same time,happy gaming!
[/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center][size=5][color=red][b]
Also please endorse if youre using this mod,because it keeps me motivated ty =)[/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/z0fw0.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center]I was utterly disappointed by Bethesda that it didnt release all-cool-knowing Lycanthropy Perk Tree,well things have changed! Here it is!
NOTE: FOR NOW THIS WILL ONLY WORK WITH THE TOL,ILL MAKE OTHER ESP WHICH IS STANDALONE FOR THE VANILLA WEREWOLF + OTHER MODS![/center]
[center][size=5][color=red][b]--------------------------------------------------------[/b][/color][/size][/center]
[center][size=5][color=red][b] NEWS SECTION [/b][/color][/size][/center]
[center]18.7.2012-The prerelease of the planned Dawnguard overhaul is now live,so feel free to test it,although im not satisfied that i released it now but what the hell...feel free to play it!
And most importantly POST any bugs,incompatibilities so i can fix them!
Until Dawnguard this mod will be incompatible with mods that alter Pickpocket/Lockpicking actor values and perk trees!
[/center]
[center]19.6.2012-UPDATE is canceled until Dawnguard release,the new features will include overhaul of the Dawnguards Werewolf Perk Tree,all my perks (some) will be included there include the two new ones like Feral Rage and Rabies,Stay tuned!
[/center]
[center]18.5.2012-Update will be released during this week or next week depends if current game testing proves \"bugless\" :D,anyway update will include:
Perks can only be aquired by how long youre a werewolf (Days as a werewolf) and total transformations (Werewolf Transformations),its harder to aquire perks now because with level progressing (as before) werewolves become ovp,perks are now balanced,reworked,added two new perks,fixed Sharp Claws Critical Strike message etc.Stay tuned!
[/center]
[center]26.4.2012-Added optional Howl to the optional files section of this mod so check it out.
[/center]
[center]14.4.2012-Uploaded fixed standalone version in optional files section,also modified both esps,new sounds etc enjoy and i hope i fixed everything. Also if youre using PerkUP delete please PerkUPLockpick.esp and PerkUPPickpocket.esp. Ty for understanding.Enjoy![/center]
[center]14.4.2012-Seems that few people mentioned they are having problems with new patch,ill upload today new esp as an optional file for members who doesnt have the ToL although few members reported that are having this issue,stay tuned![/center]
[center]13.4.2012- WORKING ON UPDATE IT WILL BE UPLOADED TODAY AS STANDALONE AND COMPATIBILITY FOR THE TOL 2.4 VERSION,ALSO IT WILL BE A LITTLE SURPRISE (IF IT WILL BE SUCCESFUL TY FOR YOUR PATIENCE.[/center]
[center]12.4.2012- Nothing to report yet.[/center]
[center][size=5][color=red][b]--------------------------------------------------------[/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center][size=5][color=red][b] DESCRIPTION [/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center]This mod adds alot of cool stuff like new sounds,perk tree and some combat related tweaks!
Until now sounds are still in development and some combat related tweaks,so be sure to stay tuned for future updates!
14.4.2012 Some people just dont GET IT that this mod doesnt add NEW perk tree it just replaces Pickpocket,Pickpocket with this esp is merged in Lockpicking and works 100 % well! The only non-dangerous bug is that if you read the Pickpocket books or train Lycanthropy will rise,dont worry about that since the Lycanthropy Perk Tree is based on the player level not on skill level =).[/center]

[center][size=5][color=red][b] LYCANTHROPY PERK TREE [/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center][IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/aud2t0.jpg[/IMG][/center]

[center]This is original my work for the [WiP] Call Of Hircine project for Skyrim,but now the project is halted which is a shame :(.
Anway since then ive merged my esp with ToL and here is the result![/center]

[center][size=5][color=red][b]PERKS[/b][/color][/size][/center]

All perks are available only when they reach certain parameters (two of them):
How long youre a werewolf (Days as a werewolf) and your total werewolf transformations.
List of perks and their requirements:

WT (Werewolf Transformations) - left \"collumn\"
DaaW (Days as a werewolf) - right \"collumn\"

WOLF CLAWS:                      
************WT********DAAW    
Lvl 1   1  10
Lvl 2   5  10
Lvl 3   10  20
LvL4   15  30
Lvl 5   20  40
lvl 6    25  50
Lvl 7   30  60
Lvl 8   35  70


ENDURANCE OF THE HUNTER:
Lvl 1                             17                                                17
Lvl 2                              20                                               20

BESTIAL SWIFTNESS:
LVL 1                           10                                                 10

HARDENED HIDE:
LVL 1                           15                                                 15 

FURY:
LVL 1                           12                                                 27
LVL 2                            15                                                35

BESTIAL FURY:
LVL 1                           20                                               20
LVL 2                           30                                               40

FURY SWIPES:
LVL 1                           25                                               65

SHARP CLAWS:
LVL 1                          25                                                45
LVL 2                          30                                                50
LVL 3                          35                                                60

LYCANTHROPY:
LVL 1                         10                                                  10
LVL 2                         20                                                   20
LVL 3                         30                                                   30

FERAL RAGE:
LVL 1                        10                                                    40

WEREWOLF ELDER:
LVL 1                        50                                                   150

RABIES:
LVL 1                        24                                                    70

Perk descriptions:

Wolf Claws:

Gives you bonus unarmed damage in your beast form,later levels provide up to 25 % higher power attack damage.

Endurance of the Hunter:

Provides faster health and stamina regeneration.
1st Level: Stamina Regen
2nd Level: Rapid Health Regen

Hardened Hide:

Provides more damage resistance from normal weapons.

Fury:

Your attacks become more faster.

Bestial Fury:

Gives you small chance to stun/paralyze your enemy.

Fury Swipes:

A devastating ability which gives werewolf their bloodlust reputation,with each consuctive hit your claws penetrate deeper into the target that causes more damage.Basically when the enemies health is lower you deal more damage but maximum of 30 bonus damage.

Sharp Claws:

Gives you a chance to deal critical strikes.

Lycanthropy:

Mastery of your inner beast provides you with more health.

Feral Rage:

When in werewolf form and on low health,you have a chance to deal x 3 damage and also lifesteal ability.

Werewolf ELder:

The skill adds bonus health and reduced damage when your health is low.

Rabies:

Not only your saliva but your claws can deal massive posion damage over time to your enemies,but with certain amount of chance.





[center][size=5][color=red][b] INSTALLATION [/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center]1. Uninstall any previous versions of this mod,make a clean save and exit.
2. Copy the esp to your Data folder
3. Eneble the esp and load it last
4. Always backup your save games when installing any mod,im not responsible from your lazyness of reading this description and im not responsible for any damage or corrupted saves.
5. Play! [/center]

[center][size=5][color=red][b]COMPATIBILITY[/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center]This mod will NOT be compatible to the other perk related mods that are related to werewolves,also just in case if you use mods like Uncapped Perks or any other perk-related mod,load this esp last.
Also this mod WILL NOT BE COMPATIBLE with the mods that alter Lockpick/Pickpocket AVs/Trees like PerkUP.

NOT COMPATIBLE WITH: [size=5][color=red][b]Sanguinare Vampiris - A Vampire Overhaul[/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center][size=5][color=red][b] RECOMMANDED MODS [/b][/color][/size][/center]
[center] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=1175]Skyrim Community Uncapper [/url][/center]
[center]Note: It is highly recommanded to install this mod also[/center]

[center][size=5][color=red][b] CREDITS [/b][/color][/size][/center]
[center]6Templar9 - For helping me to create this,his proof of concept for new perk tree gave me \"hope\" to make this possible,tnx mate ^^.
spwned - Author of great ww mod ;).
TheElderInfinity - The big boss :P of a CoH:BR project,solve that exams mate so we can continiue ;).
MofoMojo - tnx for all time help you provided! 

And also all other members who worked with me on CoH project ;).[/center]

[center][size=5][color=red][b] PERMISIONS [/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center][color=red]DO NOT attempt to copy my work or upload it on other sites,steamworkshop etc.
Also all help is well appreciated and i always look for more help =) to make this addon/mod more cool than it is.[/color][/center]

[center][size=5][color=red][b] KNOWN BUGS/FIXES [/b][/color][/size][/center]

[center][color=red]Some perks can be acessed even if your lower level than the description says,unfortinetly i cant or i dont know how to solve this,but other perks work fine (should),Wolf Claws seem to have this bug/glitch :S, CK problem probably....

Anyway report the bugs here on nexus or send me email on:

h-gate@hotmail.com[/center][/color]

I hope you will enjoy this mod as ive enjoyed making it =).
Cheers!
Xahstur
author: Xahstur
